import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { z } from 'zod' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod' import { useChangePassword } from '../hooks/useChangePassword' export default function ChangePassword() { const oneUpperCase = new RegExp(/^(?=.*?[A-Z])^/) const oneLowerCase = new RegExp(/^(?=.*?[a-z])^/) const oneDigit = new RegExp(/^(?=.*?[0-9])^/) const oneSpecialCharacter = new RegExp(/^(?=.*?[#?!@$%^&*-])^/) const validationSchema = z.object({ oldpassword: z .string() .min(1, { message: 'Must have at least 1 character' }) .regex(oneUpperCase, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Uppercase letter', }) .regex(oneLowerCase, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Lowercase letter', }) .regex(oneDigit, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Digit', }) .regex(oneSpecialCharacter, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Special Character', }) .min(8), newpassword: z .string() .min(1, { message: 'Must have at least 1 character' }) .regex(oneUpperCase, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Uppercase letter', }) .regex(oneLowerCase, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Lowercase letter', }) .regex(oneDigit, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Digit', }) .regex(oneSpecialCharacter, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Special Character', }) .min(8), confirmed_newpassword: z .string() .min(1, { message: 'Must have at least 1 character' }) .regex(oneUpperCase, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Uppercase letter', }) .regex(oneLowerCase, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Lowercase letter', }) .regex(oneDigit, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Digit', }) .regex(oneSpecialCharacter, { message: 'Your password needs atleast one Special Character', }) .min(8), }) .refine((data) => data.oldpassword === data.newpassword, { message: "New and old passwords are the same ", path: ["newpassword"], }) // .refine((data) => data.newpassword === data.confirmed_newpassword, { // message: "Passwords do not match", // path: ["confirmed_newpassword"], // }) ; type SchemaProps = z.infer; const [view, setView] = useState(false) const {changepassword, isLoading, error, isChanged} = useChangePassword() const SubmitForm = async (e: SchemaProps) => { // e.preventDefault(); const info = watch() console.log(info) await changepassword(info.oldpassword,info.newpassword,info.confirmed_newpassword) } const { register, watch, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm({ resolver: zodResolver(validationSchema), }); return ( <>

Change PostApp Password

{error && {error}}
{errors?.oldpassword && {errors.oldpassword.message}}
{errors?.newpassword && {errors.newpassword.message}}
{errors?.confirmed_newpassword && {errors.confirmed_newpassword.message}}
) => e.target.checked?setView(true):setView(false)} />
{isChanged&&}
) }
